parts.text:
TASK: STORYBOARD SKETCH. STYLE: The art style appears to be a clean, cartoonish style with an emphasis on line work. The linework is consistent and well-defined, giving the image a crisp and polished look. The use of color is limited, with the background mainly composed of grayscale tones. The floating screens add a modern or futuristic element to the scene, contrasting with the more traditional-looking room. The character design is simple yet expressive, contributing to the overall playful and lighthearted feel of the image..
CHARACTERS: Babaru 2D, Babaru 3D.
SCENE: ESTABLISHING (Wide): The Oval Office. 3:00 AM. Rain lashing against the bulletproof glass. The room is shadowed, blue, cold. The President (caricature, heavy suit) is slumped over the Resolute Desk. The desk is cluttered with trash (Diet Coke cans, burger wrappers, stacks of paper). He is scrolling on his phone, face illuminated by the harsh blue screen light..

TASK: STORYBOARD SKETCH. STYLE: The art style appears to be a clean, cartoonish style with an emphasis on line work. CHARACTERS: Babaru 2D, Babaru 3D.
SCENE: THE SPARK (Close Up): A stack of classified files next to The President's elbow. Babaru is sitting there. He is the only thing in the room that is "Warm" (lit by a soft, internal golden glow). His texture is fuzzy, soft plush..

SCENE: THE OFFER (Extreme Close Up): Babaru’s face. High detail on the stitching. Babaru tilts his head. His LED eyes blink once (mechanical shutter sound)..

SCENE: THE KICK (Medium): ON THE SNARE HIT: Babaru launches off the files. He drop-kicks a burger wrapper..

SCENE: THE PHONE (POV from The President): We see The President’s thumb about to tweet. Babaru’s plush hand slams onto the screen..

SCENE: THE CONFESSION (Two Shot): Babaru is now walking across the desk, kicking pens and staplers into perfect alignment. The President watches him, mouth slightly open, confused..

SCENE: THE STEERING WHEEL (The Visual Gag): The President is gripping the edge of the Resolute Desk. He is shaking..

SCENE: THE HANDOFF (Close Up): Babaru gently pries The President’s fingers off the desk. He pats The President’s hand. The President looks relieved. He slumps back..

SCENE: THE DANCE (Wide Master): Babaru is breakdancing on the center of the desk. The President is in the background, rhythmically bobbing his head (animated on "Twos" - slow/jerky)..

SCENE: THE FOOTBALL (Medium): The Black Briefcase (Nuclear Football) slides across the floor. Babaru catches it. He uses it as a step stool to jump higher. He doesn't open it. He disrespects it..

SCENE: THE MOTHERBOARD (Top Down / God’s Eye View): Looking down at the Oval Office rug (The Eagle Seal)..

SCENE: THE DICTATOR (Hero Low Angle): Babaru stands on the very edge of the desk, towering over the camera. Arms wide. An American Flag behind him blows in a wind that shouldn't exist indoors..

SCENE: THE NAPS (Medium): Babaru pulls a lever (that appears out of nowhere). A blanket shoots out of the ceiling and wraps The President up like a burrito. The President looks cozy..

SCENE: THE CHECKS (Montage/Fast): Babaru is at the computer. He is typing with his nubs so fast smoke is coming off the keyboard..

SCENE: THE BRUSH (Close Up): Babaru produces a tiny comb. He jumps on The President’s shoulder and combs the famous hair. It looks exactly the same (messy). Babaru shrugs..

SCENE: THE PORTRAITS (Medium): The oil paintings of Washington and Lincoln on the wall. The paintings animate. Washington puts on cool sunglasses. Lincoln nods to the beat..

SCENE: THE SCREAM (Extreme Close Up - The "SnorriCam"): Camera attached to Babaru. Background shaking violently. Babaru screams into the lens. His cute mouth opens wide—maybe a little too wide..

SCENE: THE CONFETTI (Wide): The "Nuclear Football" briefcase bursts open. Millions of pieces of colorful confetti explode out, filling the room. It’s a party..
